current_task: Enforcement system improvements - Gate 6 fix + SESSION_INIT protocol strengthening
handoff_message: ✅ COMPLETE: Fixed two enforcement issues identified from new session testing. (1) GATE 6 FALSE POSITIVE: HTML password fields (name='password') triggered secret detection, blocked legitimate commits. SOLUTION: Skip password pattern for .html files (HTML forms legitimately have password inputs). TESTED: HTML with password field now passes Gate 6. (2) SESSION_INIT PROTOCOL FAILURE: New Claude sessions still asking 'what to work on?' despite SESSION_INIT.md existing. ROOT CAUSE: CLAUDE.md referenced SESSION_INIT.md but Claude didn't execute command. SOLUTION: Embedded SESSION_INIT protocol DIRECTLY in CLAUDE.md (appears in system reminders, unavoidable). Made prohibition explicit: 'DO NOT ask what to work on', made required actions explicit: read state files, declare understanding, ask 'Should I proceed?'. COMMITS: 8e01aee (both fixes). NEXT: Test with new Claude session to verify protocol now works. PARALLEL WORK: Other Claude session fixed production URL mismatch (netlify.toml → Render backend).
